title: Cheryl 'branded Rita Ora DISRESPECTFUL in furious text rant over onstage near-kiss with Liam Payne'
text:
Cheryl reportedly lashed out at Rita Ora and branded her 'disrespectful' in a furious text rant following am onstage near-kiss with her former partner Liam Payne.

The Fight For This Love hitmaker, 36, was apparently left seething after spotting her then boyfriend looking intimate with the pop star during a performance of their Fifty Shades track For You on Jim Fallon's show last year, reports The Sun.

Cheryl was reportedly watching the show at home with the her and Liam's son Bear, now two, when she spied the pair getting extremely close and immediately reached for her phone, pals of the pair told the publication.

Fuming: Cheryl reportedly lashed out at Rita Ora in a furious text rant following an 'inappropriate' near-kiss with her former partner Liam Payne

Inappropriate: Cheryl, 36, was apparently left seething after spotting her then beau looking intimate with the pop star during a performance of their Fifty Shades track For You last year

The Girls Aloud star went public with the 26-year-old One Direction hunk in 2016, before splitting in 2018. They welcomed son Bear in 2017.

The publication reported that Cheryl texted Rita: 'That’s my boyfriend and the father of my child you’re flirting with — it’s disrespectful. Do you really think that’s necessary?'

It is also said that Cheryl confronted Liam over his steamy actions with Rita, which occurred on The Tonight Show in January 2018.

The friend continued to say that Cheryl was 'home alone' with her then 11-month-old 'asleep upstairs' when she watched her boyfriend and Rita, 28, perform on the American show.

Furious: Cheryl was watching the show at home with the her and Liam's son Bear, two, when she spied the pair getting extremely close and immediately reached for her phone

They added: 'She saw him and Rita all over each other, and Rita looking like she was going in for a kiss. Obviously it was very upsetting.

'She immediately texted Rita, asking her what the hell was going on. She said she thought it was inappropriate and basically asked her to back off.'

MailOnline have contacted representatives of Cheryl and Rita for comment.

The Sun reported that Rita was left 'mortified' over the text and insisted that 'nothing was going on' between them, with Rita claiming she wouldn't go there 'in a million years.'

Another source is said to have added to the publication that Rita and Cheryl have made up since the spat and everyone is amicable.

While Cheryl was not impressed, the performance sent fans wild with many discussing the chemistry between the pair.

In the aftermath of Cheryl's angry accusations, Liam and Rita appeared to tone down their performances, with spectators spotting their 'visible lack of chemistry' at the BRIT Awards three weeks later.

Cheryl and Liam announced their split on July 1st 2018 after two and a half years together - though it's not suggested their break-up had anything to do with Rita.

An insider said that Rita and Cheryl, who starred on The X Factor together, have since 'patched up their differences', with their no longer being any 'bad blood' between them.

The revelations ironically come just days after the Bedroom Floor warbler hinted that his racy 50 Shades duet and tactile displays during live performances with Rita contributed to his split from Cheryl.

Liam told Closer magazine: '[My duet with Rita] didn't do very much for my personal life. But it did a lot for... Yeah, no, it was good.'

He enthused: 'I love her, she’s really great... Out of all my collaborations, I’d say she’s one of my favourites.'

Liam has remained close with Rita and even brought his new girlfriend Maya Henry along to support her at her Escada launch during Paris Fashion Week.
